block.p: CYPRUS-Niki of Mattituck, LI (formerly of Tenafly, NJ), October 3, 2000 at the age of 77. Beloved wife of Nick. Loving mother of Nick S. Cyprus and Chris Cyprus. Cherished grandmother of Nicole, Lauren and Nicholas D. Cyprus. Friends may visit the DeFriest Funeral Homes, Inc, 13805 Main Road, Mattituck, LI (11 miles East of Route 495-Exit 73.) today from 6 PM until 9:30 PM. Funeral services, Friday 11:30 AM, Transfiguration of Christ Greek Orthodox Church, Breakwater Rd, Mattituck. Interment New Bethany Cemetery
